issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
There is a delay to replay streaming audio after stop.
To reproduce:
1. Install and run KS> Phone> Sound >Audio Session Mode
2. Click Play streaming audio
3. Click Stop
4. Click Play streaming audio 

Actual result:
No visual result that the label clicked, audio started playing with significant delay
fields.summary: iOS7: Audio Session Mode - delay playing streaming audio after stop
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.1.201306131423
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.1GA
iPhone 5 iOS 7.0
Xcode5
CLI 3.1.1
KitchenSink Version 3.1.1.GA

comments.body: There is no bug here. the audio takes a couple of seconds to load up, this is normal as we are loading the url on main thread. Verified the same behavior on iOS 6.

Closing as invalid.
Mac osx 10.9.3 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201406111952
